item.title: Snooker and Pool win first medal in Shield
item.author: Aaron E Brown,Robert Hughes,
item.description: Records tumbled at the first inter-university pool tournament of the year as a new-look Imperial team pulled off some stunning wins and overcame bad luck (and hangovers) to earn their first ever medal in the Southern England Univesities Pool Council Team Shield event. The team set off early Saturday â€¦
